title.narrative: Programa de Reforma del Transporte Aéreo

description.narrative: The proposed Policy Based Loan will support the overhaul and modernization of Aviation Sector Policy in Bahamas. This modernization includes new institutional structure and changes in the legal and financial structure governing the sector. The Program will also support the incorporation of private sector management and financing for airport infrastructure.
